definition: tough upright grass/fig. a staunch character able to withstand tough test
the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test/also written 疾風勁草|疾风劲草
the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
containing_words.word: 疾风知劲草，烈火见真金

sentences.english: Sturdygrass withstands high winds; true gold stands the test of fire.
sentences.chinese: 劲草经得住强风，真金经得住火炼。

sentences.english: A true friend is known in the day of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 疾风知劲草，患难知友情。

sentences.english: Friend is never known till a man has need.
sentences.chinese: 疾风知劲草，到患难时，才能认识谁是真正的朋友。

definition: the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
soughing/whistling or rushing sound (of the wind in trees, the sea etc)
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
Kaoshu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
